brandGuidance.style: Pixel art matching character sprites. Warm palette. Readable at small sizes.
brandGuidance.materials: Natural materials - wood, stone, iron, cloth, glass. NO sci-fi, NO plastic.
brandGuidance.magic: Subtle warmth glow only - like ember light. NO neon, NO energy effects.
brandGuidance.context: These are collected/interacted with during gameplay - must be instantly recognizable

prompt.subject: Ember Shard - collectible currency/progression item
prompt.description: Small crystalline fragment that holds the warmth of the Everember. Orange-amber color, faceted like a gem but organic feeling.
prompt.appearance: Warm amber crystal, roughly triangular, inner glow like trapped firelight. NOT a coin, NOT a star.
prompt.animation: 6 frame gentle pulse/shimmer cycle - the inner light breathes
prompt.size: Small enough to fit in a paw, visible against any background
prompt.style: Pixel art, 32x32, warm colors, subtle glow effect
prompt.negative: NO neon, NO electricity, NO sci-fi crystal

prompt.subject: Heartnut - health restoration pickup
prompt.description: A special acorn/nut that restores health. Heart-shaped when viewed from certain angle. Warm reddish-brown color.
prompt.appearance: Stylized acorn with subtle heart shape, rich chestnut brown with warm highlights
prompt.lore: Grown in the Kitchen Gardens, infused with Everember warmth
prompt.negative: NO glowing hearts, NO cartoon hearts, NO modern health symbols

prompt.subject: Checkpoint Brazier - save point
prompt.description: Small iron brazier on a stone pedestal, connected to the Everember's warmth. Flames kindle when activated.

appearance.inactive: Cold iron bowl on worn stone base, unlit, ancient but well-maintained
appearance.active: Same brazier with warm flames dancing, subtle ember particles rising

prompt.animation: Row 1: Unlit idle (2), kindling sequence (4), lit idle loop (2). Row 2: Lit fire animation loop (8 frames)
prompt.interaction: Player touches it, flames spring to life, warmth spreads outward
prompt.style: Pixel art, 48x64, iron/stone materials, warm fire colors when lit
prompt.negative: NO magical symbols, NO sci-fi elements, NO floating

prompt.subject: Wooden door - interior passage
prompt.description: Sturdy oak door with iron bands and ring handle. Fits the abbey/medieval aesthetic.
prompt.appearance: Aged oak planks, iron reinforcement bands, round iron ring handle, slightly worn at handle height
prompt.animation: 5 frames: Closed, cracking open, half open, mostly open, fully open
prompt.style: Pixel art, 48x80, natural wood tones, iron gray accents
prompt.negative: NO modern doors, NO glass panels

prompt.subject: Iron gate - dungeon/cellar passage
prompt.description: Heavy iron portcullis-style gate. Bars with decorative (but corroded) scrollwork.
prompt.appearance: Vertical iron bars, horizontal crossbars, ancient scrollwork at top, rust spots, chains visible at sides
prompt.animation: 5 frames: Closed (lowered), raising 25%, raising 50%, raising 75%, fully raised
prompt.style: Pixel art, 64x96, iron grays with rust orange accents
prompt.negative: NO laser barriers, NO force fields

prompt.subject: Wall lever - mechanism trigger
prompt.description: Iron lever mounted on stone wall bracket. Operates gates, platforms, etc.
prompt.appearance: Iron lever arm with wooden grip, stone mounting plate, visible pivot mechanism
prompt.animation: 4 frames: Up position, tilting 30%, tilting 60%, down position
prompt.negative: NO buttons, NO switches, NO electronics

prompt.subject: Treasure chest - contains items/shards
prompt.description: Small wooden chest with iron bands. Not overly ornate - practical storage that might hold something valuable.
prompt.appearance: Oak chest, iron corner bands, simple iron latch, slightly battered from age
prompt.animation: 6 frames: Closed, latch clicking, lid cracking, lid half, lid fully open, contents visible (warm glow)
prompt.contents_shown: Subtle amber glow suggesting ember shards within, NOT piles of gold
prompt.style: Pixel art, 40x32, wooden/iron, warm glow when opened
prompt.negative: NO ornate decorations, NO magical runes, NO gold coins spilling out

prompt.subject: Scroll - lore/story item
prompt.description: Rolled parchment with wax seal. Contains lore when read.
prompt.appearance: Aged parchment, partially unrolled, red wax seal with simple emblem, ink visible on exposed paper
prompt.style: Pixel art, 32x32, parchment yellows, red seal

prompt.subject: Wooden platform tiles - traversable surfaces
prompt.description: Sturdy wooden planks for platforms and bridges. Modular design.
prompt.tiles: Left end cap, middle (repeatable), middle variant, right end cap
prompt.appearance: Weathered oak planks with visible wood grain, iron nail heads, slight wear on edges
prompt.style: Pixel art tileset, 32x32 per tile, natural wood tones

prompt.subject: Stone platform tiles - abbey architecture
prompt.description: Carved stone blocks for abbey floors and platforms. Ancient, slightly mossy.
prompt.tiles: Left carved end, middle (repeatable), middle with moss, right carved end
prompt.appearance: Gray stone blocks with subtle chisel marks, patches of moss in joints, worn smooth on top from centuries of use
prompt.style: Pixel art tileset, 32x32, stone grays with green moss accents
prompt.negative: NO modern concrete, NO polished marble

prompt.subject: Retractable floor spikes - dungeon hazard
prompt.description: Iron spikes that extend from floor traps. Clearly telegraphed, fair challenge.
prompt.animation: 6 frames: Retracted (safe), hint of movement (warning), extending 25%, extending 50%, fully extended (danger), holding
prompt.appearance: Iron spikes in stone housing, rust on spikes, worn stone floor plate
prompt.style: Pixel art, 32x32, clear visual difference between safe/danger states
prompt.negative: NO glowing tips, NO poison drip

prompt.subject: Crumbling floor section - timed hazard
prompt.description: Stone floor that crumbles when stood on. Visual warning before collapse.
prompt.animation: 5 frames: Stable, cracks appearing, shaking/dust, breaking apart, falling pieces
prompt.appearance: Ancient stone floor with visible cracks, dust particles, chunks separating
prompt.style: Pixel art, 48x32, stone colors, clear crumbling progression
